name: Robbie the Roomba
description:
This is my submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020, whose prompt was "Out of Control.

This game is basically about moving Robbie the Roomba to that green thingy. Originally it wasn't meant to be Roomba, but I thought it was much easier to do graphics for that than what I originally intended.

Most of the time was spent making Robbie not go thru walls, but he still does clip sometimes.

To-do (but probably won't do them):

  • Fix some bugs
  • Make better graphics, because it took me about 2-3h before the deadline to do them

Known bugs:

  • Robbie goes thru walls
  • Menu music isn't playing properly when going back to it from level select and "instructions" page
  • Level 3 doesn't load in the level select
  • Actually there's a lot of level changing problems

Also I would really like your info on that banger music
